snippet: An Israeli news channel reported that Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu asked the Israeli military in 2010 to prepare for an attack on the Iranian nuclear program.
abstract: Israeli news channel reports that Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu and Defense Min Ehud Barak asked the Israeli military in 2010 to prepare for an imminent attack on the Iranian nuclear program.

byline.contributor: Gabby Sobelman contributed reporting from Jerusalem, and David E. Sanger from Washington.

lead_paragraph: An Israeli news channel reported that Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu asked the Israeli military in 2010 to prepare for an attack on the Iranian nuclear program.

headline.seo: Israeli Report Cites a Thwarted 2010 Move on Iran
headline.main: Israeli Report Cites a Thwarted 2010 Move on Iran
headline.print_headline: Israeli Report Cites a Thwarted 2010 Move on Iran
